00004                        --- CAEN SpA - Computing Systems Division ---

00006         -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00007 
00008         Name            :       CONSOLE.H
00009 
00010         Description :   Include file for 'Console.c'.
00011                                         
00012                                         Add '__LINUX' define to generate a Linux exe file.
00013 
00014                                         
00015         Date            :       November 2004
00016         Release         :       1.0
00017         Author          :       C.Landi
00018 
00019 
00020 
00021         -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00022 
00023         This file contains the following procedures & functions declaration               
00024                                                                           
00025         con_init         initialize the console                                  
00026         con_end          close the console                                       
00027         write_log        write a message into the log file                       
00028         con_getch        get a char from console without echoing                 
00029         con_kbhit        read a char from console without stopping the program   
00030         con_scanf        read formatted data from the console                    
00031         con_printf       print formatted output to the standard output stream    
00032         gotoxy           set the cursor position                                 
00033         con_printf_xy    print formatted output on the X,Y screen position    
00034         clrscr           clear the screen                                        
00035         clear_line       clear a line                                            
00036         delay            wait n milliseconds 
00037         
00038         -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 */
00040

00049 /****************************************************************************/
00050 /*                                 short names                              */
00051 /****************************************************************************/
00052 
00053 #ifndef ulong
00054 #define ulong unsigned long 
00055 #endif
00056 #ifndef uint
00057 #define uint unsigned int 
00058 #endif
00059 #ifndef ushort
00060 #define ushort unsigned short
00061 #endif
00062 #ifndef uchar
00063 #define uchar unsigned char
00064 #endif

00067 /*******************************************************************************/
00068 /*                       Usefull ascii codes                                   */
00069 /*******************************************************************************/
00070 
00071 #define CR           0x0D     /* carriage return */
00072 #define BLANK        0x20     /* blank           */
00073 #define ESC          0x1B     /* escape          */
00074 #define BSP          0x08     /* back space      */
00075 
00076 /* terminal types */
00077 #define TERM_NOT_INIT   FALSE
00078 #define TERM_INIT       TRUE

00083 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00084 /* Initialize the console                                                   */
00085 /****************************************************************************/
00086 
00087 void con_init(void);
00088 
00089 
00090 /****************************************************************************/
00091 /*                              CON_END                                     */
00092 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00093 /* Reset the console to the default values                                  */
00094 /****************************************************************************/
00095 
00096 void con_end(void);

00100 /*                             WRITE_LOG                                      */
00101 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00102 /* parameters:     msg        ->   log message text                           */
00103 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00104 /* Write a messege in the log file                                            */
00105 /******************************************************************************/
00106 
00107 void write_log(char *);

00110 /******************************************************************************/
00111 /*                               CON_GETCH                                    */
00112 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00113 /* return:        c  ->  ascii code of pressed key                            */
00114 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00115 /* Get a char from the console without echoing and return the character read. */
00116 /******************************************************************************/
00117 
00118 int  con_getch(void);
00119 
00120 
00121 /******************************************************************************/
00122 /*                               CON_KBHIT                                    */
00123 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00124 /* return:        0  ->  no key pressed                                       */
00125 /*                c  ->  ascii code of pressed key                            */
00126 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00127 /* Rad the standard input buffer; if it is empty, return 0 else read and     */
00128 /* return the ascii code of the first char in the buffer. A call to this      */
00129 /* function doesn't stop the program if the input buffer is empty.            */
00130 /******************************************************************************/
00131 
00132 char con_kbhit(void);
00133 
00134 
00135 /******************************************************************************/
00136 /*                               CON_SCANF                                    */
00137 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00138 /* parameters:     fmt       ->   format-control string                       */
00139 /*                 app       ->   argument                                    */
00140 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00141 /* return:         number of fields that were successfully converted and      */
00142 /*                 assigned (0  ->  no fields were assigned)                  */
00143 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00144 /* Rad formatted data from the console into the locations given by argument  */
00145 /******************************************************************************/
00146 
00147 int con_scanf(char *, void *);
00148 
00149 
00150 /******************************************************************************/
00151 /*                               CON_PRINTF                                   */
00152 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00153 /* parameters:     fmt       ->   format string: must contain specifications  */
00154 /*                                that determine the output format for the    */
00155 /*                                argument                                    */
00156 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00157 /* return:         number of characters printed                               */
00158 /*                 or a negative value if an error occurs                     */
00159 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00160 /* Print formatted output to the standard output stream                       */ 
00161 /******************************************************************************/
00162 
00163 int con_printf(char *,...);
00164 
00165 
00166 /****************************************************************************/
00167 /*                               GOTOXY                                     */
00168 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00169 /* parameters:     x, y ->   position on the screen                         */ 
00170 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00171 /* Place the cursor at position x,y on the screen                           */
00172 /****************************************************************************/
00173 
00174 void gotoxy(int, int);
00175 
00176 
00177 /****************************************************************************/
00178 /*                             CON_PRINTF_XY                                */
00179 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00180 /* parameters:     xpos, ypos ->   position on the screen                   */

00182 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00183 /* Print a messege on the X,Y screen position                               */
00184 /****************************************************************************/
00185  
00186 int con_printf_xy(uint, uint, char *,...);
